name: LAN Echo
tagline: Basic LAN system coded in C#.
body:
### Welcome LAN Echo Project
Hi, this is very simple C# based LAN Echo Server/Client system. This is an introductory level project to socket programming.

```
$ cd debai/LANEcho
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### The Idea
The idea behind this project is to start a series of advanced C# programming. this being the first one. Visit my GitHub to see all my projects here (@debai).

### Authors and Contributors
Abhisek De (@debai)

### Support or Contact
Please e-mail at abhisek.de@live.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
